quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success. Henry Ford

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. Winston Churchill

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand. Vince Lombardi

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.Bruce Lee

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.Albert Einstein

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.Jim Rohn

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.Bill Gates

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice

quote.name: sucess
quote.advice: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value. Albert Einstein

quote.name: family
quote.advice: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them. Desmond Tutu

quote.name: family
quote.advice: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going. George Carlin

quote.name: family
quote.advice: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship. Margaret Mead

quote.name: family
quote.advice: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, all of us laughing and talking, loving and understanding, not looking at the past but only to the future. LaToya Jackson

quote.name: family
quote.advice: Family is the most important thing in the world. Princess Diana

quote.name: family
quote.advice: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there. Barbara Bush

quote.name: family
quote.advice: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.

quote.name: family
quote.advice: A happy family is but an earlier heaven. George Bernard Shaw

quote.name: family
quote.advice: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street. Willie Stargell

quote.name: family
quote.advice: Children are the keys of paradise. Eric Hoffer

quote.name: music
quote.advice: If music be the food of love, play on. William Shakespeare

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Where words fail, music speaks. Hans Christian Andersen

quote.name: music
quote.advice: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Beautiful music is the art of the prophets that can calm the agitations of the soul; it is one of the most magnificent and delightful presents God has given us. Martin Luther

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Music can change the world because it can change people. Bono

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Without music, life would be a mistake. Friedrich Nietzsche

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy. Ludwig van Beethoven

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman. Ludwig van Beethoven

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven. Walter Savage Landor

quote.name: music
quote.advice: Tones sound, and roar and storm about me until I have set them down in notes. Ludwig van Beethoven

quote.name: education
quote.advice: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education. Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote.name: education
quote.advice: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change. Carl Rogers

quote.name: education
quote.advice: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom. George Washington Carver

quote.name: education
quote.advice: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth. Chanakya

quote.name: education
quote.advice: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life. Norman Cousins

quote.name: education
quote.advice: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society. Theodore Roosevelt

quote.name: education
quote.advice: The only fence against the world is a thorough knowledge of it. John Locke

quote.name: education
quote.advice: Education is the movement from darkness to light. Allan Bloom

quote.name: education
quote.advice: It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education. Albert Einstein

quote.name: education
quote.advice: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. Maimonides

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years. Ausonius

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories. Buddy Valastro

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years. Ausonius

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new. Sammy Hagar

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy. Abhishek Bachchan

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well. Voltaire

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness. Brad Garrett

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: It takes a long time to become young. Pablo Picasso

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been. Madeleine L'Engle

quote.name: birthday
quote.advice: I'm a summer baby, so I usually have my birthday as a good summer memory. Sloane Crosley

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood. Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity. Khalil Gibran

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out. Walter Winchell

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Friends are the siblings God never gave us. Mencius

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness. Euripides

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably. William Penn

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over. Octavia Butler

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes. Friedrich Nietzsche

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness. Euripides

quote.name: friendship
quote.advice: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend. Martin Luther King, Jr

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower. Hans Christian Andersen

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it. Jules Renard

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction. E. O. Wilson

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower. Albert Camus

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature. Gerard De Nerval

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever. Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: There are always flowers for those who want to see them. Henri Matisse

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises. Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: Earth and sky, woods and fields, lakes and rivers, the mountain and the sea, are excellent schoolmasters, and teach some of us more than we can ever learn from books. John Lubbock

quote.name: nature
quote.advice: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer. Albert Camus

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: Sooner or later, we will have to recognise that the Earth has rights, too, to live without pollution. What mankind must know is that human beings cannot live without Mother Earth, but the planet can live without humans. Evo Morales

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: Environmental pollution is an incurable disease. It can only be prevented. Barry Commoner

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: The problem is that everywhere the gas drilling industry goes, a trail of water contamination, air pollution, health concerns and betrayal of basic American civic and community values follows. Josh Fox

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: I don't want to wait 20 or 50 years for something to be done about petrochemical pollution. Jack Herer

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: Australia is the only island continent on the planet, which means that changes caused by planet-warming pollution - warmer seas, which can drive stronger storms, and more acidic oceans, which wreak havoc on the food chain - are even more deadly here. Jeff Goodell

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: There's so much pollution in the air now that if it weren't for our lungs there'd be no place to put it all. Robert Orben

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: Like a tracer running through the veins of the city, networks of air quality sensors attached to bikes can help measure an individual's exposure to pollution and draw a dynamic map of the urban air on a human scale, as in the case of the Copenhagen Wheel developed by new startup Superpedestrian. Carlo Ratti

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: Because cap and trade is enforced through the selling and trading of permits, it actually perpetuates the pollution it is supposed to eliminate. James Hansen

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: The environment will continue to deteriorate until pollution practices are abandoned. B. F. Skinner

quote.name: pollution
quote.advice: The Chinese have figured out that they have a giant environmental problem. Folks in Beijing, some days, literally can't breathe. Over a million Chinese die prematurely every year because of air pollution. Joe Biden

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you. Loretta Young

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own. H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.' Erich Fromm

quote.name: love
quote.advice: You can't blame gravity for falling in love. Albert Einstein

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye. H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love. Mother Teresa

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love. Mother Teresa

quote.name: love
quote.advice: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other. Audrey Hepburn

quote.name: love
quote.advice: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love. Max Muller

quote.name: love
quote.advice: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies. Aristotle

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can. Nikos Kazantzakis

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory. George S. Patton

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows. Ralph Marston

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others. Ayn Rand

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. Thomas A. Edison

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water. Rabindranath Tagore

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. Arthur Ashe

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do. Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn. Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote.name: motivation
quote.advice: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better. Samuel Beckett

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: The word 'happiness' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. Carl Jung

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water. Christopher Morley

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: Every human walks around with a certain kind of sadness. They may not wear it on their sleeves, but it's there if you look deep. Taraji P. Henson

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: I've cried, and you'd think I'd be better for it, but the sadness just sleeps, and it stays in my spine the rest of my life. Conor Oberst

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: You left and I cried tears of blood. My sorrow grows. Its not just that You left. But when You left my eyes went with You. Now, how will I cry? Rumi

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: Sorrows are like thunderclouds, in the distance they look black, over our heads scarcely gray. Jean Paul

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: Depression is the inability to construct a future. Rollo May

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy. Leo Buscaglia

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: Those who don't know how to weep with their whole heart, don't know how to laugh either. Golda Meir

quote.name: sad
quote.advice: They say it's better to bury your sadness in a graveyard or garden that waits for the spring to wake from its sleep and burst into green. Conor Oberst

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail. Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. Lao Tzu

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing. Socrates

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: It takes a great man to give sound advice tactfully, but a greater to accept it graciously. Logan Pearsall Smith

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you. John Wooden

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them. John C. Maxwell

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination. Nelson Mandela

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails. William Arthur Ward

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: Be as you wish to seem. Socrates

quote.name: wisdom
quote.advice: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one. Albert Einstein

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles. William Hazlitt

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened. Dr. Seuss

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose. Tom Wilson

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do. Mother Teresa

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight. Phyllis DillerÂ

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: Smile, it's free therapy. Douglas Horton

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life. Jeanne Calment

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles. Washington Irving

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: Look back, and smile on perils past. Walter Scott

quote.name: smile
quote.advice: I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better. Diane Lane

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness. Charles Spurgeon

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future. Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness. William E. Gladstone

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us. Ashley Montagu

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony. Thomas Merton

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be. Abraham Lincoln

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new. Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: t is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness. Thomas Jefferson

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: When ambition ends, happiness begins. Thomas Merton

quote.name: happiness
quote.advice: Happiness: an agreeable sensation arising from contemplating the misery of another. Ambrose Bierce

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence. Vince Lombardi

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud. Maya Angelou

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants. Isaac Newton

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us. Joseph Campbell

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light. Aristotle Onassis

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success. Swami Sivananda

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted. Aesop

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself. Joseph Campbell

quote.name: inspiration
quote.advice: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship. Buddha

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me. Anne Hathaway

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better. Henry Rollins

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty. Mother Teresa

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change. Gretchen Rubin

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering. Dalai Lama

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: The essence of Richard Nixon is loneliness. Henry A. Kissinger

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Loneliness is never more cruel than when it is felt in close propinquity with someone who has ceased to communicate. Germaine Greer

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: Leadership is the other side of the coin of loneliness, and he who is a leader must always act alone. And acting alone, accept everything alone. Ferdinand Marcos

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: There's a difference between solitude and loneliness. Maggie Smith

quote.name: loneliness
quote.advice: My inspiration are the woman, friendship, and loneliness. Enrique Iglesias
